metadata.name: EPIC Album Cover
metadata.description:
Official cover art for the music album EPIC by Fletch Winters.

A tragic love story of epic proportions, EPIC by Fletch Winters is filled with sonic themes of broken promises, broken hearts and broken dreams while finding the courage and inner strength to persevere through it all.  Combining raging guitars, grinding sawtooth basslines, orchestral punch and authentically poignant lyrics over belligerently striking drums, EPIC is a musical adventure through the mythological underworld that will take you on an emotional journey of EPIC proportions.
